Caption: Fig. 1. Our proposed system (sViSIT) extracts motion paths of moving objects in surveillance video. The content of each movement path is made available through action shot images (top images) and properties of the motion itself are visualized using a space-time cube (bottom-images). Users can quickly navigate through such content and its associated trajectories to locate items of interest. Notice that in the middle action shot image, the user can locate the suspect person who left a box on the floor.
